data.name: Megadimension Neptunia VII Ultimate Weapon Pack
data.detailed_description:
Feel the ultimate power with this Ultimate Weapon Pack! Just don't go mad with the power... Each character gets 3 new weapons.

Includes the following:
  • Neptune's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Noire's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Blanc's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Vert's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Nepgear's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Uni's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Rom's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Ram's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Uzume's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Older Neptune's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • IF's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • Compa's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • B-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • S-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • C-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set
  • K-Sha's Ultimate Weapon Set

data.short_description: Feel the ultimate power with this Ultimate Weapon Pack! Just don't go mad with the power... Each character gets 3 new weapons.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Shader v5 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 17 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Shader v5 or newer
